content: Fucking gold, here. I also struggle with swearing, as I don’t feel like I convey my authentic feelings when I refrain from using profanity. I try to use clues from my environment or platform to determine whether authenticity is called for; Facebook requires restraint, as my mom and my coworkers/boss are friends there, but Snapchat stories gets loaded with f bombs when I’m particularly passionate about something that I’m witnessing/doing.
